numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows percentages of young people.
2. These young people say that they reach out to their parents at least once a day or a few times a week.
3. Young women send texts to their parents at a higher rate than young men do.
4. Young women phone their parents at a higher rate than young men do.
5. Young women video-chat with their parents at a higher rate than young men do.
6. Young women visit their parents in person at a higher rate than young men do.
7. I wonder whether social media ruins genuine face-to-face conversations.
8. I wonder whether technology ruins genuine face-to-face conversations.
9. The 18-34 age group often lives away from home.
10. If the 18-34 age group lives away from home then in-person visits are unattainable.
12. I fit the demographics of this study.
13. I feel represented in the data.
14. I get along with nearly everyone.
15. I am surrounded with these people on a regular basis.
16. I am in the age range that this graphic examines.
17. The headline is: Are you chatting?
